title: Funding Circle has globe in its sights after Zencap deal
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Funding Circle has globe in its sights after Zencap deal Samir Desai said the banking system was “outdated and inefficient” Samir Desai said the banking system was “outdated and inefficient” James Hurley Enterprise Editor   21 2015 
The apparently unstoppable march of Britain’s peer-to-peer lenders has taken a step into Germany with the acquisition by Funding Circle of Zencap, a continental rival. Samir Desai, a co-founder and the chief executive of Funding Circle, said that the deal would lead to it becoming the “first truly global marketplace lending platform”. 
The lender to small companies is the largest example of a rapidly emerging alternative finance industry that is challenging the conventional approach to business finance. Alongside Britain, it now has operations in the United States, Germany, Spain and the Netherlands.
